languages.text: {n}Идира содрогается всем телом.{/n} "Это работает не так. Я могу попробовать прочитать память предметов... но мертвецы — совершенно другое. Для подобного нужна будет ее душа... после того, что мы видели на офицерской палубе, я не рискну искать ее в {g|Encyclopedia:Warp}варпе{/g}".

traits.locale_text: {n}Идира содрогается всем телом.{/n} "Это работает не так. Я могу попробовать прочитать память предметов... но мертвецы — совершенно другое. Для подобного нужна будет ее душа... после того, что мы видели на офицерской палубе, я не рискну искать ее в {g|Encyclopedia:Warp}варпе{/g}".

languages.text: {n}Idira's whole body shudders.{/n} "It doesn't work like that. I can try to read the memories of objects... but dead bodies are a different story. Something like that would require her soul... and after what we saw on the officers' deck, I won't risk searching for it in the {g|Encyclopedia:Warp}warp{/g}."
languages.original_text: {n}Идира содрогается всем телом.{/n} "Это работает не так. Я могу попробовать прочитать память предметов... но мертвецы — совершенно другое. Для подобного нужна будет ее душа... после того, что мы видели на офицерской палубе, я не рискну искать ее в {g|Encyclopedia:Warp}варпе{/g}".

Something like that would require her soul... and after what we saw on the officers' deck, I won't risk searching for it in the {g|Encyclopedia:Warp}warp{/g}."

languages.text: {n}伊迪拉整个身体都在颤抖着。{/n}“我的能力不是这么用的。我可以试着读取物品的记忆……但尸体就是另一回事了。如果想感知她的记忆，我需要找到她的灵魂……不过，军官甲板上的惨状，我们也都看到了。我可不打算在{g|Encyclopedia:Warp}亚空间{/g}里铤而走险。”
languages.original_text: {n}Idira's whole body shudders.{/n} "It doesn't work like that. I can try to read the memories of objects... but dead bodies are a different story. Something like that would require her soul... and after what we saw on the officers' deck, I won't risk searching for it in the {g|Encyclopedia:Warp}warp{/g}."

traits.locale_text: {n}伊迪拉整个身体都在颤抖着。{/n}“我的能力不是这么用的。我可以试着读取物品的记忆……但尸体就是另一回事了。如果想感知她的记忆，我需要找到她的灵魂……不过，军官甲板上的惨状，我们也都看到了。我可不打算在{g|Encyclopedia:Warp}亚空间{/g}里铤而走险。”

languages.text: {n}Idira se estremece, temblorosa.{/n} «No funciona así. Puedo intentar leer los recuerdos de un objeto... pero los cadáveres son caso aparte. Para eso necesitaría su alma... y visto lo visto en la cubierta de oficiales, no pienso buscarla en la {g|Encyclopedia:Warp}disformidad{/g}».
languages.original_text: {n}Idira's whole body shudders.{/n} "It doesn't work like that. I can try to read the memories of objects... but dead bodies are a different story. Something like that would require her soul... and after what we saw on the officers' deck, I won't risk searching for it in the {g|Encyclopedia:Warp}warp{/g}."

traits.locale_text: {n}Idira se estremece, temblorosa.{/n} «No funciona así. Puedo intentar leer los recuerdos de un objeto... pero los cadáveres son caso aparte. Para eso necesitaría su alma... y visto lo visto en la cubierta de oficiales, no pienso buscarla en la {g|Encyclopedia:Warp}disformidad{/g}».

languages.text: {n}イディラの全身が震える。{/n}「それはうまくいかない。物体の記憶を読み取ってみることはできる…しかし、死体となると、彼女の魂が必要だから話は別よ…そして、士官デッキであれを目撃した後、{g|Encyclopedia:Warp}<歪み>{/g}でそれを探すリスクを冒すことはできない」
languages.original_text: {n}Idira's whole body shudders.{/n} "It doesn't work like that. I can try to read the memories of objects... but dead bodies are a different story. Something like that would require her soul... and after what we saw on the officers' deck, I won't risk searching for it in the {g|Encyclopedia:Warp}warp{/g}."

traits.locale_text: {n}イディラの全身が震える。{/n}「それはうまくいきません。物体の記憶を読み取ろうとすることはできます…しかし、死体となると話は別です。彼女の魂が必要だからです…そして、士官デッキであれを目撃した後、{g|Encyclopedia:Warp}<歪み>{/g}でそれを探すリスクを冒すことはできません。
{n}イディラの全身が震える。{/n}「それはうまくいかない。物体の記憶を読み取ってみることはできる…しかし、死体となると、彼女の魂が必要だから話は別よ…そして、士官デッキであれを目撃した後、{g|Encyclopedia:Warp}<歪み>{/g}でそれを探すリスクを冒すことはできない」

languages.text: {n}Un frisson parcourt le corps d'Idira.{/n} « Ça ne marche pas comme ça. Je peux tenter de lire les souvenirs des objets, mais pour les cadavres... c'est une autre histoire. Pour ça, il faudrait que j'atteigne son âme... et après ce qui s'est passé sur le pont des officiers, je ne prendrai pas le risque de la chercher dans le {g|Encyclopedia:Warp}Warp{/g}. »
languages.original_text: {n}Idira's whole body shudders.{/n} "It doesn't work like that. I can try to read the memories of objects... but dead bodies are a different story. Something like that would require her soul... and after what we saw on the officers' deck, I won't risk searching for it in the {g|Encyclopedia:Warp}warp{/g}."

traits.locale_text: {n}Un frisson parcourt le corps d'Idira.{/n} « Ça ne marche pas comme ça. Je peux tenter de lire les souvenirs des objets, mais pour les cadavres... c'est une autre histoire. Pour ça, il faudrait que j'atteigne son âme... et après ce qui s'est passé sur le pont des officiers, je ne prendrai pas le risque de la chercher dans le {g|Encyclopedia:Warp}Warp{/g}. »

languages.text: {n}Idiras ganzer Körper erzittert.{/n} "So funktioniert das nicht. Ich kann versuchen, die Erinnerungen von Objekten zu lesen ... aber Leichen sind eine andere Geschichte. Dazu wäre ihre Seele vonnöten ... und nach dem Anblick auf dem Offiziersdeck werde ich es nicht riskieren, im {g|Encyclopedia:Warp}Warp{/g} danach zu suchen."
languages.original_text: {n}Idira's whole body shudders.{/n} "It doesn't work like that. I can try to read the memories of objects... but dead bodies are a different story. Something like that would require her soul... and after what we saw on the officers' deck, I won't risk searching for it in the {g|Encyclopedia:Warp}warp{/g}."

traits.locale_text: {n}Idiras ganzer Körper erzittert.{/n} "So funktioniert das nicht. Ich kann versuchen, die Erinnerungen von Objekten zu lesen ... aber Leichen sind eine andere Geschichte. Dazu wäre ihre Seele vonnöten ... und nach dem Anblick auf dem Offiziersdeck werde ich es nicht riskieren, im {g|Encyclopedia:Warp}Warp{/g} danach zu suchen."

languages.original_text: {n}Idira's whole body shudders.{/n} "It doesn't work like that. I can try to read the memories of objects... but dead bodies are a different story. Something like that would require her soul... and after what we saw on the officers' deck, I won't risk searching for it in the warp."

languages.text: {n}İdira'nın tüm bedeni ürperiyor.{/n} "O şekilde işlemiyor. Nesnelerin anılarını okumaya çalışabilirim lakin naaşlar apayrı bir mesele. Anılarını görebilmek için ruhuna ihtiyacım var... Subay güvertesinde gördüklerimizden sonra da ruhunu {g|Encyclopedia:Warp}öteboyutta{/g} aramayı göze alamam."
languages.original_text: {n}Idira's whole body shudders.{/n} "It doesn't work like that. I can try to read the memories of objects... but dead bodies are a different story. Something like that would require her soul... and after what we saw on the officers' deck, I won't risk searching for it in the {g|Encyclopedia:Warp}warp{/g}."

traits.locale_text: {n}İdira'nın tüm bedeni ürperiyor.{/n} "O şekilde işlemiyor. Nesnelerin anılarını okumaya çalışabilirim lakin naaşlar apayrı bir mesele. Anılarını görebilmek için ruhuna ihtiyacım var... Subay güvertesinde gördüklerimizden sonra da ruhunu {g|Encyclopedia:Warp}öteboyut{/g}ta aramayı göze alamam."
